attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have made this to show that the poorer  families like mine struggle to even keep a house let alone pay for taxes and all the other things the government get off us... I say STOP the inflation of food and taxes... we cant afford it and you are making many homes like ours and possibly homes with new born babies out on the street, do you want this?

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
